overview: “...man says: I am self, I am master, all the rest is other - outside, below, underneath, subservient. I own, I use, I explore, I exploit, I control.  I am that I am, and the rest is women & wilderness, to be used as I see fit.”  - Ursula K. Le Guin  Made with sadness after the leaked opinion. Released with sadness after the decision.
title: They’re Only Animals
